-- 9. Customer segmentation summary
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN TotalSpent > 1000 THEN 'VIP'
        WHEN TotalSpent > 500 THEN 'Premium'
        WHEN TotalSpent > 200 THEN 'Standard'
        ELSE 'Basic'
    END AS CustomerSegment,
    COUNT(*) AS CustomerCount,
    AVG(TotalSpent) AS AvgSpending,
    AVG(TotalTransactions) AS AvgTransactions
FROM dbo.vw_customer_analytics
GROUP BY 
    CASE 
        WHEN TotalSpent > 1000 THEN 'VIP'
        WHEN TotalSpent > 500 THEN 'Premium'
        WHEN TotalSpent > 200 THEN 'Standard'
        ELSE 'Basic'
    END
ORDER BY AvgSpending DESC;
